idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
from tunepad.constants import *  # Import constants for beat durations
from tunepad.chords import *     # Import chord functions
import random                    # For variation in notes and rhythms

# Function to set mood-specific parameters
def set_mood_params(mood):
    if mood.lower() == 'happy':  # Case-insensitive check
        chords = [[48, 52, 55], [53, 57, 60], [55, 59, 62]]  # Major chords
        scale = [48, 50, 52, 53, 55, 57, 59, 60]             # C major scale
        volume = 100                                         # Base volume
        drum_intensity = 90                                  # Drum intensity
    return chords, scale, volume, drum_intensity

# Set mood and unpack parameters
mood = 'happy'
chords, scale, volume, drum_intensity = set_mood_params(mood)

# User guidance prints
print("Playing Happy Mood Music - Electric Bass version...")
print("Set UI BPM to 120, Instrument to 'electric bass' for melody/harmony, and 'standard kit' for drums!")

# Main loop for composition (40 iterations for ~20-30s music)
for i in range(40):
    beat_in_measure = i % 4  # Track beat position
    
    # Dynamic drum intensity
    current_drum_intensity = drum_intensity + random.randint(-10, 10)
    
    # Drums: Bass on downbeats
    if beat_in_measure == 0 or beat_in_measure == 2:
        playNote(36, beats=QUARTER_NOTE / 2, velocity=current_drum_intensity, sustain=0.2)
    
    # Snare on off-beats or randomly
    if beat_in_measure == 1 or beat_in_measure == 3 or random.random() > 0.75:
        playNote(38, beats=EIGHTH_NOTE, velocity=current_drum_intensity * 0.9, sustain=0.1)
    
    # Hi-hat every quarter
    if i % 4 == 0:
        playNote(42, beats=SIXTEENTH_NOTE, velocity=current_drum_intensity * 0.85, sustain=0.1)
    
    # Occasional crash
    if i % 8 == 0 and random.random() > 0.7:
        playNote(49, beats=QUARTER_NOTE, velocity=100, sustain=0.3)
    
    # Melody: Cyclic base note with offset
    base_note_index = i % len(scale)
    note_offset = random.randint(0, 7)
    note = scale[base_note_index] + note_offset
    
    # Rare jumps
    if random.random() > 0.9:
        note += random.choice([4, 7])
    
    # Random duration and volume
    duration = random.choice([EIGHTH_NOTE, QUARTER_NOTE])
    current_volume = volume * random.uniform(0.9, 1.0)
    playNote(note, beats=duration, velocity=current_volume, sustain=0.5)
    
    # Harmony: Chords on downbeats or randomly
    if beat_in_measure == 0 or random.random() > 0.7:
        chord_notes = random.choice(chords)
        chord_volume = volume * random.uniform(0.8, 1.0)
        playNote(chord_notes, beats=HALF_NOTE, velocity=chord_volume, sustain=0.7)
    
    # Occasional rest
    if random.random() > 0.8:
        rest(SIXTEENTH_NOTE)
    else:
        rest(0)
    
    # Debug print every 10 loops
    if i % 10 == 0:
        print("Loop %d: Current playhead ~%.1f beats" % (i, getPlayhead()))

# Completion print
print("Finished! Final playhead: %.1f beats" % getPlayhead())

    base_note_index = i % len(scale)

        chord_notes = random.choice(chords)
        chord_volume = volume * random.uniform(0.8, 1.0)
        playNote(chord_notes, beats=HALF_NOTE, velocity=chord_volume, sustain=0.7)
    
    # Occasional rest
    if random.random() > 0.8:
        rest(SIXTEENTH_NOTE)
    else:
        rest(0)

        print("Loop %d: Current playhead ~%.1f beats" % (i, getPlayhead()))
